package.name: iOSSecuritySuiteBypass
package.shortDescription: A bypass for the iOSSecuritySuite Swift library.

descriptionlist.description:
iOSSecuritySuiteBypass is a jailbreak detection bypass for the iOSSecuritySuite Swift library.
The iOSSecuritySuite library itself is used by some app store apps in order to detect if the device is jailbroken.
It is an extremely basic tweak but it works for what it is.

iOSSecuritySuiteBypass is a tweak available on both rootless and rootful jailbreaks.
